name: Born (itch) (Maria Mison)
description:
today we are God and we create from our own image.

like a rib, like a seed, like an infernal coil

Born is a failed DND  supplement, and a treatise to the act of creation, of how we take from our own body and give life to the personas, these characters, masks and births, deaths, fake lives, and real lives we lead. It's an interactive sensory poem. It can also be played through like a single story game, or a way to legitimately add flesh to any of characters. Wether it be theater, improv or yes, DND. 

It's a submission to #OurLittleFoodJam, #JammiJamJam & #HellYeahPoetryJam

mostly @kazumiochin's fault. @temporalhiccup is making me fall in love with collages again. thank you.
